title: Mindy Kaling dazzles in black one-shoulder dress at NY premiere for Apple's The Morning Show
text:
She's an in demand actress, writer and producer.

And on Monday night, Mindy Kaling walked the red carpet at the star-studded premiere in New York for Apple TV's The Morning Show.

Kaling, 40, put on a show in a sleeveless one-shoulder black dress and black sandal heels.

Stylish: Mindy Kaling walked the red carpet at the premiere in New York for Apple TV's The Morning Show Monday night in a sleeveless one-shoulder black dress and black sandal heels

Her frock was cinched at the waist and had a flared skirt with below-the-knee hemline.

Her heels featured silver sparkly embellishments and she carried a black and silver evening purse.

Kaling wore her hair styled back from her face in a sophisticated updo and added diamond earrings.

Chic: Her frock was cinched at the waist and had a flared skirt with below-the-knee hemline. Her heels featured silver embellishments and she carried a black and silver evening purse

Multi-hyphenate: The actress, writer and producer, 40, wore her hair styled back from her face in a sophisticated updo and added diamond earrings and glossy lip color

Kaling found fame as one of the stars of NBC's The Office.

She went on to create and star in comedy series The Mindy Project and wrote and starred in the film Late Night which was bought by Amazon Studios after premiering at the Sundance Film Festival in January.

She's currently developing an as-yet untitled project for Netflix.
